text: Ansar Ali Siddiqui was a Bangladesh Nationalist Party politician and the former Member of Parliament of Sirajganj-6. ==Career== Siddiqui was elected to parliament from Sirajganj-6 as a Bangladesh Nationalist Party candidate in 1991. He served as the state minister for Irrigation, Water Development and Flood Control. ==Death== Siddiqui died on 16 April 2013 in BIRDEM hospital, Dhaka, Bangladesh. ==References== Category:Bangladesh Nationalist Party politicians Category:2013 deaths Category:5th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:6th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Water Resources ministers
title: Ansar Ali Siddiqui
